issue_title: retina-agent panics when running locally in a Kind cluster
summary: The 'Packetparser' plugin is causing a panic because it is trying to attach 'tc' programs to the 'eth0' device, which is not present in the Kind setup running on a Windows machine. A fix is being tracked in this issue to handle the error more gracefully. Additionally, the plugins are dependent on the underlying host kernel, so Retina may not work as expected in this setup.
